    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: from pandas import Series
    4: 
    5: 
    6: @pytest.mark.parametrize(
    7:     "data, index, expected",
    8:     [
    9:         ([1, 2, 3], None, 3),
   10:         ({"a": 1, "b": 2, "c": 3}, None, 3),
   11:         ([1, 2, 3], ["x", "y", "z"], 3),
   12:         ([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], ["x", "y", "z", "w", "n"], 5),
   13:         ([1, 2, 3], None, 3),
   14:         ([1, 2, 3], ["x", "y", "z"], 3),
   15:         ([1, 2, 3, 4], ["x", "y", "z", "w"], 4),
   16:     ],
   17: )
   18: def test_series(data, index, expected):
   19:     # GH#52897
   20:     ser = Series(data, index=index)
   21:     assert ser.size == expected
   22:     assert isinstance(ser.size, int)
